sourcesContent:
No movies registered

 import { MovieService } from './../movie.service'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Movie } from '../movie'; @Component({ selector: 'app-details', templateUrl: './details.component.html', styleUrls: ['./details.component.css'] }) export class DetailsComponent { movieList: Movie[] = []; constructor(private service: MovieService){} ngOnInit() : void{ this.service.getMovies().subscribe((movieList) => { this.movieList = movieList; }); } }
